h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 12\. Enter Photo Mode in Alternate Ways
content: You can hold down the right trigger and press that same button listed in the menu to go straight into it during game. Using an Xbox Controller, it’s the right trigger and the Back Button.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '12\. Enter Photo Mode in Alternate Ways'.
The content is as follows:
You can hold down the right trigger and press that same button listed in the menu to go straight into it during game. Using an Xbox Controller, it’s the right trigger and the Back Button.
